definition: to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy

sentences.english: If, though, this trait is too annoying, end the friendship.
sentences.chinese: 可是如果這種性格太煩人，那就終結友誼。

sentences.english: It's a problem to do differerent thing eextremecclyday.
sentences.chinese: 每一天干同一種任務是挺煩人的。

sentences.english: Well, that identification here is re-imagined and we're invited into it, too, troublingly, I think.
sentences.chinese: 這兒又是這樣了，有些煩人，我這麼想。

sentences.english: This is especially annoying for deletion of an instance.
sentences.chinese: 其中特別煩人的是對象實例的刪除。

sentences.english: She is really a pill, spending whole day harping and complaining.
sentences.chinese: 她真煩人，整天嘮嘮叨叨的。

sentences.english: It also helps remove those odors that can be irritating.
sentences.chinese: 醋也幫助我們祛除那些煩人的臭味。

sentences.english: George was tired of Tom's advice and told him to go jump in the lake.
sentences.chinese: 喬治厭倦了湯姆的勸告，所以叫他走遠點不要煩人。

sentences.english: I could feel their stares boring into my back.
sentences.chinese: 我能感覺到他們煩人的目光直射着我的背。

sentences.english: Yes, and all of these nasty questions make baby Jesus cry.
sentences.chinese: 是的，所有這些煩人的問題會讓神子耶穌哭泣。

sentences.english: Above all, I hate talking to those poker faces everyday.
sentences.chinese: 最煩人的是，我討厭每天和那些撲克臉說話。

sentences.english: The alacrity bright loquacious woman, loquacious get vexed person.
sentences.chinese: 活潑開朗長舌婦，嘮叨得煩人。

sentences.english: Everyone decided she was better, and that I was worthless and annoying.
sentences.chinese: 大家都認爲那個女人更棒，而我只是個煩人的廢柴。

sentences.english: We've all dated people with annoying friends.
sentences.chinese: 我們都和有煩人朋友的人約會過。

sentences.english: But this is starting to get bothersome.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在開始有些煩人了。

sentences.english: I had a sprained my foot in Geneva, an annoying problem.
sentences.chinese: 我在日內瓦扭傷了腳，這是一個煩人的問題。

sentences.english: Because it is really annoying to have cold arms when reading in bed.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在牀上看書的時候手挨凍可是很最煩人的。

definition: to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy
see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
hard to deal with/hard to get along with
